content:
# It seems that I mistakenly believed I had enough Copper Plates to craft Copper Cables, but the inventory check confirmed that I have none left.
# The inventory shows only stone, iron ore, and iron plates.

# Since I have exhausted my Copper Plates, I need to gather more Copper Ore and smelt it into Copper Plates again.
# I will move to the nearest Copper Ore resource patch to harvest more ore.

# Let's find the nearest Copper Ore patch and harvest 10 units to start the smelting process again.
nearest_copper_patch = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)  # Locate the nearest Copper Ore patch.
move_to(nearest_copper_patch)  # Move to the Copper Ore patch.
harvest_resource(position=nearest_copper_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 units of Copper Ore.

# After harvesting, I will check my inventory to confirm the amount of Copper Ore collected.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Copper Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting.
